title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. B, pt. 2522 - Rent Adjustments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. B, pt. 2522 - Rent Adjustments

State Regulations
§ 2522.1 - Legal regulated rent adjustments
§ 2522.2 - Effective date of adjustment of legal regulated rents
§ 2522.3 - Fair market rent appeal and other applications for adjustment of initial legal regulated rent for housing accommodations
§ 2522.4 - Adjustment of legal regulated rent
§ 2522.5 - Lease agreements
§ 2522.6 - Orders where the legal regulated rent or other facts are in dispute, in doubt, or not known, or where the legal regulated rent must be fixed
§ 2522.7 - Consideration of equities
§ 2522.8 - Rent adjustments upon vacancy or succession
§ 2522.9 - Surcharge for the installation and use of washing machines, dryers and dishwashers
§ 2522.10 - Surcharges for submetered electricity or other utility service
§ 2522.11 - Schedule

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. B, pt. 2522

Statutory authority: N.Y.C. Administrative Code, §§ 26-511[b], 26-518 [a]; L. 1974, ch. 576, § 10a; Public

Housing Law, § 14[4]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
